title: log in
body: Just wondering if there was anyway that you could recover my old account. I tried logging in and it says my username or password are not correct and I know they are correct because I just played on it last night. Is there anyway you can get my account working again?

replies.body:
That's strange, are you sure you're patcher is connected to the right region?  You can also use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) just in case you need to do a password reset.

If you still run into trouble, hit us up directly through our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team can help you individually with this.  I hope that helps!
